CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 모든 Monster 모델에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- 몬스터의 피격 관련 코드 -- 몬스터 피격 쿨타임, 피격 여부 관리 -- 공격자의 공격 정보에 따라 상태이상 부여(이동속도 감소, 최대체력 비레 틱뎀, 추가 데미지, 넉백) -- 방어력이 데미지보다 높으면 피격 무시

CodeBlockMethod.Name: IsHitTarget
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local ImmuneCooldown = self.Entity.Monster.ImmuneCooldown local currentTime = _UtilLogic.ElapsedSeconds
if self.LastHitTime + ImmuneCooldown < currentTime then self.LastHitTime = _UtilLogic.ElapsedSeconds return true end
return false

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnHit
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity local Defence = Entity.Monster.Defence
if damage > 0 then if Defence < damage then --_SoundService:PlaySoundAtPos(Entity.Monster.HitSoundRUID, Entity.TransformComponent.Position, Entity, 1) local EffectInfo = _UtilLogic:Split(attackInfo, "_")
if EffectInfo[1] ~= "Normal" and EffectInfo[2] ~= "Nothing" then self:SetSkillEffect(attacker, EffectInfo[2], tonumber(EffectInfo[3])) end
__base:OnHit(attacker, (damage - Defence) * self.BleedingCoeff,isCritical,attackInfo,hitCount) end else Entity.Monster:CalcDmg(damage) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetSkillEffect
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 스킬 이펙트 관련 함수가 아니라 스킬에 있는 부가효과를 발동시키는 함수
local Entity = self.Entity local Position = Vector3(0, Entity.HitComponent.BoxSize.y, 0)
if EffectType == "Freezing" then local OriginalSpeed = self.Entity.MovementComponent.InputSpeed self.Entity.MovementComponent.InputSpeed = self.Entity.MovementComponent.InputSpeed / 2 _TimerService:ClearTimer(self.FreezingTimer) _EffectService:RemoveEffect(self.FreezingEffectSerial) self.FreezingTimer = _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(self.Freezing, EffectAmount) self.FreezingEffectSerial = _EffectService:PlayEffectAttached("02c022f3ecf9459a98198a5c312e4977", Entity, Position, 0, Vector3.one, true) elseif EffectType == "Burning" then _TimerService:ClearTimer(self.BurningTimer) _EffectService:RemoveEffect(self.BurningEffectSerial) self.BurningTimer = _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(self:Burning(EffectAmount), 1) self.BurningEffectSerial = _EffectService:PlayEffectAttached("521b6c51d0ff425093bc14f89b6cd223", Entity, Position, 0, Vector3.one, true) elseif EffectType == "Bleeding" then self.BleedingCoeff = 1.1 _TimerService:ClearTimer(self.BleedingTimer) _EffectService:RemoveEffect(self.BleedingEffectSerial) self.BleedingTimer = _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(self.Bleeding, EffectAmount) self.BleedingEffectSerial = _EffectService:PlayEffectAttached("903aff3108ca436aa018ef8b2afe9102", Entity, Position, 0, Vector3.one, true) elseif EffectType == "KnockBack" then self:KnockBack(attacker, EffectAmount) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: Freezing
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if isvalid(self) then self.Entity.MovementComponent.InputSpeed = self.Entity.MovementComponent.InputSpeed * 2 _EffectService:RemoveEffect(self.FreezingEffectSerial) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: Burning
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
return function() local Entity = self.Entity if isvalid(Entity) then RemainTime = RemainTime - 1
if RemainTime >= 0 then local Hp = Entity.Monster.Hp local MaxHp = Entity.Monster.MaxHp if Hp > MaxHp * 0.1 then Entity.Monster:CalcDmg(MaxHp*0.05) else Entity.Monster:CalcDmg(Hp - 1) end
self.BurningTimer = _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(self:Burning(RemainTime), 1) else _EffectService:RemoveEffect(self.BurningEffectSerial) end else _EffectService:RemoveEffect(self.BurningEffectSerial) end end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: KnockBack
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity local attackerPosition = attacker.TransformComponent.Position local MonsterPosition = Entity.TransformComponent.Position local Direction = nil
if attackerPosition.x > MonsterPosition.x then Direction = -1 else Direction = 1 end
Entity.RigidbodyComponent:SetForce(Vector2(EffectAmount * Direction, 1))
